segments.text: I see the woman, her apron fluttering slightly as she moves, completely unaware of the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic scene of domestic life, yet with an undeniable hint of tension underneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, like an idealized version of family life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, things are about to go terribly wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to toppling off that stool, it's nerve-wracking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t decide if I’m horrified or amused at their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching them, I think about how kids always seem to find trouble, even in the simplest situations.
segments.speaker: PAR
